targets.expr: count( sum by (session) ( rate(play_seconds_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$plex_instance", server=~"$server", stream_type=~"(transcode|directplay|DirectPlay)"}[$__rate_interval]) ) > 0 ) or on() vector(0)
count( sum by (session) ( rate(play_seconds_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$plex_instance", server=~"$server", stream_type=~"(directplay|DirectPlay)"}[$__rate_interval]) ) > 0 ) or on() vector(0)

count( sum by (session) ( rate(play_seconds_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$plex_instance", server=~"$server", stream_type="transcode", transcode_type=~"(video|both)"}[$__rate_interval]) ) > 0 ) or on() vector(0)

count( sum by (session) ( rate(play_seconds_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$plex_instance", server=~"$server", stream_type="transcode", transcode_type=~"(audio|both)"}[$__rate_interval]) ) > 0 ) or on() vector(0)
count( sum by (session) ( rate(play_seconds_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$plex_instance", server=~"$server", subtitle_action="transcode"}[$__rate_interval]) ) > 0 ) or on() vector(0)
count( sum by (session) ( rate(play_seconds_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$plex_instance", server=~"$server", subtitle_action="burn"}[$__rate_interval]) ) > 0 ) or on() vector(0)

sum by (user, device_type, device, stream_resolution, stream_file_resolution, server, stream_bitrate, stream_type, what) ((label_join(label_join(rate(play_seconds_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$plex_instance", server=~"$server", media_type="episode", stream_type!=""}[45s]), "what", " / ", "title", "child_title"), "what", " / ", "what", "grandchild_title") or label_join(rate(play_seconds_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$plex_instance", server=~"$server", media_type!="episode", stream_type!=""}[45s]), "what", "", "title"))) > 0
avg by (instance, gpu) ( DCGM_FI_DEV_ENC_UTIL{job="dcgm", instance=~"$gpu_instance", gpu=~"$gpu"} )

(node_hwmon_temp_celsius{instance="$instance"} * on (chip, sensor, instance) group_left(label) node_hwmon_sensor_label{instance="$instance"} * on (chip, instance) group_left(chip_name) node_hwmon_chip_names{instance="$instance", chip_name=~"k10temp|coretemp"})

(node_hwmon_temp_celsius{instance="$instance", chip=~"nvme_.*"} * on (chip, sensor, instance) group_left(label) node_hwmon_sensor_label{instance="$instance", label="Composite"} * on (chip, instance) group_left(chip_name) node_hwmon_chip_names{instance="$instance"})

panels.description: Incoming and outgoing network traffic per interface
panels.title: Network Traffic

targets.expr:
sum(increase(play_seconds_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$plex_instance", server=~"$server"}[$__interval])) by (media_type) * ignoring(day,dow) group_right

 label_replace(   
 label_replace(   
 label_replace(   
 label_replace(   
 label_replace(   
 label_replace(      
 label_replace(   
 count_values without() ("day", day_of_week(timestamp(
      sum(increase(          
         play_seconds_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$plex_instance", server=~"$server"}          
      [$__interval]))  by (media_type)
    )
  ))
  ,"dow","Sunday","day","0")
  ,"dow","Monday","day","1")
  ,"dow","Tuesday","day","2")
  ,"dow","Wednesday","day","3")
  ,"dow","Thursday","day","4")
  ,"dow","Friday","day","5")
  ,"dow","Saturday","day","6")

panels.description: Combined temperature readings all devices with a sensor.

targets.expr: (node_hwmon_temp_celsius{instance="$instance"} * on (chip, sensor, instance) group_left(label) node_hwmon_sensor_label{instance="$instance"} * on (chip, instance) group_left(chip_name) node_hwmon_chip_names{instance="$instance"}) > 0

((node_hwmon_temp_celsius{instance="$instance"} unless on (chip, sensor, instance) node_hwmon_sensor_label{instance="$instance"}) * on (chip, instance) group_left(chip_name) node_hwmon_chip_names{instance="$instance"}) > 0
